page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: {DISCO'S}ARE HELD IN THE WILSON INSTITUTE.IT COSTS{FIFTY PENCE}TO GET IN AND DRINKS AND CRISPS ARE AVAILABLE.IT STARTS AT{SEVEN-THIRTY}IN THE EVENING AND FINISHES AT{TEN}AT NIGHT.TOILETS ARE THERE ALSO.THERE IS A SEPERATE ROOM WHERE YOU CAN PLAY OTHER GAMES.YOU CAN BRING YOUR OWN RECORDS. {THE PARK}IS ON A LARGE PIECE OF OPEN GRASSLAND.THERE IS ONE{SLIDE},A{ {CLIMBING FRAME},AN{OLD TRACTOR,A {SEE-SAW}AND A{ROUNDABOUT.}FURTHER DOWN THE PARK THERE IS ANOTHER GRASSED PLAY AREA.THERE USED TO BE A HEDGE IN FRONT OF THE SLIDE BUT IT HAS BEEN CHOPPED DOWN.
